description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the installation failure issue identified by the error code 0x80070643 due to insufficient disk space:

1. Ensure your device has adequate disk space to perform updates. Free up space by removing unnecessary files or applications.
2. After clearing disk space, attempt to reapply the update provided under KB-5034441.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses the error related to the error code handling routine for Windows updates. Clearing sufficient disk space is critical to avoid the installation failure message.
- For more details, refer to the KB article: [KB-5034441 - Windows Recovery Environment Update](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8).
